languages.text: "Какой чудесный и редкий дар! Я с радостью поставлю его в своих покоях".
"What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."
languages.original_text: "Какой чудесный и редкий дар! Я с радостью поставлю его в своих покоях".

traits.locale_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be happy to display it in my chambers."
"What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be happy to display it in my chambers."
"What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."
"What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."
"What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."
"What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

languages.text: “这真是件非同凡响的礼物！我很乐意把它摆在我的房间里。”
languages.original_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

traits.locale_text: “这真是件非同凡响的礼物！我很乐意把它摆在我的房间里。”

languages.text: 「なんと貴重で壮大な贈り物だ！私室にこれを飾れるとは、とても光栄だ」
languages.original_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと貴重で壮大な贈り物だ！私室にこれを飾れるとは、とても光栄だ」

languages.text: «¡Qué obsequio tan magnífico y singular! Será un honor para mí exponerlo en mis aposentos».
languages.original_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué obsequio tan magnífico y singular! Será un honor para mí exponerlo en mis aposentos».

languages.text: "Ne ender ve muhteşem bir armağan! Bunu odamda sergilemekten şeref duyarım."
languages.original_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

traits.locale_text: "Ne ender ve muhteşem bir armağan! Bunu odamda sergilemekten şeref duyarım."

languages.text: « Un cadeau à la fois rare et splendide ! Ce sera un honneur pour moi de l'exposer dans mes quartiers. »
languages.original_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

traits.locale_text: « Un cadeau à la fois rare et splendide ! Ce sera un honneur pour moi de l'exposer dans mes quartiers. »

languages.text: "Was für ein seltenes und wunderbares Geschenk! Es wird mir eine Ehre sein, es in meinen Gemächern zu präsentieren."
languages.original_text: "What a rare and magnificent gift! I will be honoured to display it in my chambers."

traits.locale_text: "Was für ein seltenes und wunderbares Geschenk! Es wird mir eine Ehre sein, es in meinen Gemächern zu präsentieren."
